name: Weather App
description: A simple weather app using Visual Crossing & GIPHY API.

scripts.deploy:delete-branch: git branch -D gh-pages && git push origin --delete gh-pages
scripts.deploy:sync-branch: git status && git add . && git commit -m "final deployment" && git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit
scripts.deploy:commit: git add dist -f && git commit -m "Deployment commit"
scripts.deploy:upload: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages && git checkout main
